tool_description:
IMP: This project has been stopped as Heroku has withdrawn it's free plan. Please use https://gitlab.com/SatvikG7/stock-scraper/.
Api for scraping value of stock from Google Finance.
title: Stock Scraper

api_list.description: Endpoint to check if your api key is valid or not
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stock-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stock-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: /:ticker/:exchange
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stock-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/{ticker}/{exchange}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stock-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: /MSFT/NASDAQ
api_list.description: Fetch the value of Microsoft's Stock from NASDAQ Exchange with Google Finance
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stock-scraper.p.rapidapi.com/MSFT/NASDAQ"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stock-scraper.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
